name: Witchy (amasuri, YoukaiDrawing, anivire)
description:
Simulator of a little witch. Help her brew potions to commit villainy! 😈

🤔 Hmm, how to play?

  1. Click on cards to select poison effect,
  2. Сlick on Witch or next to her to brew a potion from selected cards.
  3. Choose the place where you want to use the potion to poison the little people and get points for them, for which you can later prepare new potions again.

Known issues:

  1. Occasionally clicks on cards and the witch don't get registered. In these cases, please click several times :)

Credits:
